pages.text: Many legends speak of vicious corpses who feast on the blood of the living to sustain their own unnatural life, who can also transform into flittering bats as they stalk the night. Legends also speak of people who transform into hideous wolfish abominations that consume and destroy the lives of the innocent,

and are possessed by this animalistic predatory desire the instant the light of the full moon touches their wretched flesh. As such, many occultists wish to become one of these monsters. However no such rite to do so has been discovered. Perhaps later the way to become one will be discovered.
